name: Star-Pit Starship
description: Star-Pit Starship is an addictive arcade score-chaser. Build your ship and blast some baddies. The longer you last in the pit, the more money you'll earn and the better you can build your next ship. Build-Battle-Repeat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + Storage: 5 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + Storage: 5 MB available space
